com.psddev.dari.util

Class ImageEditor.Static

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.psddev.dari.util.ImageEditor.Static
  • Enclosing interface:
    ImageEditor

    public static final class ImageEditor.Static
extends Object
    Image editor utility methods.

    The factory methods, getInstance(java.lang.String) and getDefault(), use settings to construct instances.

    For the image editing functions, such as crop(java.lang.String, com.psddev.dari.util.StorageItem, java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.Object>, java.lang.Integer, java.lang.Integer, java.lang.Integer, java.lang.Integer) and resize(java.lang.String, com.psddev.dari.util.StorageItem, java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.Object>, java.lang.Integer, java.lang.Integer), the editorName parameter may be null to use the default image editor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static StorageItem crop(ImageEditor editor, StorageItem image, Map<String,Object> options, Integer x, Integer y, Integer width, Integer height)
      Crops the given image from the given x and y by the given width and height using the given editor.

      • crop

        public static StorageItem crop(ImageEditor editor,
               StorageItem image,
               Map<String,Object> options,
               Integer x,
               Integer y,
               Integer width,

        Crops the given image from the given x and y by the given width and height using the given editor. Uses the default if editor is null.
